name: useIntersectionObserver
description: Custom hook that tracks the intersection of a DOM element with its containing element or the viewport using the [`Intersection Observer API`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Intersection_Observer_API).

props.name: options
props.description: The options for the Intersection Observer.

schema.name: freezeOnceVisible
schema.description: If true, freezes the intersection state once the element becomes visible.

schema.name: initialIsIntersecting
schema.description: The initial state of the intersection.

schema.name: onChange
schema.description: A callback function to be invoked when the intersection state changes.

schema.name: root
schema.description: The element that is used as the viewport for checking visibility of the target.

schema.name: threshold
schema.description: A threshold indicating the percentage of the target's visibility needed to trigger the callback.

returns.name: return
returns.rawType: [(node: Element | null) => void, boolean, IntersectionObserverEntry | undefined] & Object
